metadata.name: Samurai Saga Music Pass #1
metadata.description: Introducing the groundbreaking Samurai Saga album ONGAKU, a harmonious fusion of legendary artists and innovative styles. This album is destined to become an integral piece of the expansive Samurai Saga universe. Experience immersive live events, both physical and digital, featuring in-game RYOs tokens, the central Genki token, and exclusive NFT displays from dedicated collectors. Embrace this revolutionary collaboration and dive into a fresh, interconnected world of music, art, and community.
